1.content:
You are walking home from school, and you find yourself thinking of whether buying Pokemon: Platinum was worth the money. But as you are thinking this you see a sort of a portal appear in front of you. "This doesn't seem like something that should happen out of the blue," you say. You slowly walk towards the portal, as it starts to close.

You're find yourself flying through space as planets whiz by very quickly. You see yourself cloaked in a pinkish-purple light, probably what's keeping you alive at this speed in space. After a while you slowly lose consciousness.

When you wake up, you hear a voice from above that says, "Whew, You're up, I thought you were injured." You look up and see the face of a giant...
1.title: Set Up

choices: Fast Forward to the end of the day.
11.content:
...Lucario. From the voice, you guess that it's a male, or a really manly female... You clumsily get onto your feet and look down, and notice that you're standing on his left paw. He continues talking, "Hmm... A tiny human, I wonder where you came from." You stare at him, with a slightly scared expression on your face. Apparently he noticed this and said, "Oh sorry, I'm not gonna hurt you. I guess I should introduce myself. I'm Luke Aura, and you are?" You swallow, trying to piece together what has happened in a matter of seconds. You were walking home, went through a mysterious portal, and now you're in the hands of a giant Lucario. When you hear him ask a question, you answer him, "Oh, my name's Jim, sorry. I'm a little confused as to what happened..." Luke smiles a little bit and places you on a nearby table.

As you look at him, he looks just like a Lucario from Pokemon, just you know, giant. He walks over to a dresser drawer and pulls out a button up shirt. "I guess he can't wear regular shirts cause of that spike," you think. He walks back over to you and picks you up and puts you in front of his muzzle and says, "I gotta go to work, and I can't really leave you alone here." Before you can say anything, he places you in the front pocket of the shirt. You slowly fall asleep from the beat of his heart, and the rhythm of his steps.

After a while you feel yourself being lifted up. When you look around, you find yourself in the same light as before. When you look away, you now see a giant Mewtwo. You seem to be floating in mid-air in front of it. You hear the voice of Luke from behind say, "Did he make it okay?" The Mewtwo responds, "As far as I can tell, yes. He'll just drift in and out of sleep every now and then for about a day or two." Luke lets out a sigh of relief and says, "Whew, Thanks buddy." "Don't mention it."

Luke lets out a paw, and you slowly float into it. He places you back into the pocket. He walks to a school to do his job as a teacher. When he gets to his classroom, you find out that he teaches 5th graders.
11.title: Let's meet this Lucario, shall we?

112.content:
You must have slept the entire day, because the next thing you know, you hear the bell that means that school is over. You hear Luke say to the class, "Oh right, before you all go, I would like you to meet a friend of mine." You wonder who he's talking about, maybe the Mewtwo from earlier? Well, your question is answered when you see Luke's paw coming into the pocket to pick you out. You look around the class and see pokemon, human, and pokemorph children of various varieties. You hear Luke continue talking, "This is my friend, Jim." One of the children said, "Do we squish it?" Another child tried to answer him and said, "No, stupid, you eat them." This doesn't exactly fill you with joy.

Luke sighs, and tells them, "You're both wrong, tiny humans are to take care of, sort of like a pet." You can tell that he didn't really want to say pet, but it was the only word that he could think of. He walks over, places you on the desk and sits down. The children start to exit the classroom with their things. After the entire class exits, two of them come back in, a Pichu, and an Eevee. The Pichu comes up to Luke and asks, "Mr. A, can we play with the tiny human, please?" Luke looks at them with a smile, and says, "You're gonna have to ask him about that." The two look at each other, confused until the Eevee realizes what he's talking about. He puts his front paws on the desk, his nose almost right in front of you and asks, "Can we play with you, Mr. Jim?" You're a little flattered that he said Mr, and maybe that's what persuaded you to say, "Yeah, sure."

Luke picks you up and hands you to them, and due to Eevee's lack of paws/hands Pichu held on to you. They walk over to the corner of the room and toss you in the air a few times, very careful as to not hurt you. After you calm down from that, they get a piece of paper and fold it into a paper airplane. Pichu places you in the plane and throws it to Luke. The plane lands right in front of Luke and he looks up. He smiles and picks you up. "Be careful, you three. We don't want Jim getting hurt." The door opens and a Raichu and and Umbreon walk in. The Raichu is the first one to say something. "Pichu, what's been taking you so long?" You can hear a sort of femininity in it's voice. The Pichu replies to her, "we were just playing with Mr. A's new friend." The Raichu looks around and says, "Where is this friend of his?" Luke chuckles and says, "Right there on my desk, Miss Chu." She looks down and sees you on the desk, "A tiny human? This one must've been expensive." You are shocked by her words, apparently you're not the first human to come here. Luke looked at her and said, "Actually, Jim was a gift, if I have to say that. But anyway, Miss Chu, I'm sorry for keeping your son here. And you too Mr. Volve." The Umbreon that walked in with the Raichu gave a grunt and walked out with the Eevee. The Pichu pats you on the head and walks out with the Raichu.

Lucario puts his papers in his desk and picks you up. "In case you're wondering, yes people buy tiny humans. But they can only buy them from my buddy, Matt, who was the Mewtwo that you met earlier. Tiny humans are expensive because he wants to make sure that people will take care of them." That pretty much answers the question that you had for him. He places you in his shirt pocket again and walks home.
112.title: In the End

13.content:
Buizel. Judging by her breasts and pink lips, it probably was a female.

"Who are you?" I asked the Buizel girl, "Oh, and I'm James"

"My name is...
13.title: Buizel

131.content:
"My name is Lyn" Lyn introduced herself. She had big, nerdy glasses and some dental braces too. I've been a huge nerd myself, so I could relate a little.

"Hey!" A voice yelled, "Did you collect the newest one?"

"I've...just found him" Lyn responded in a quiet tone.

Suddenly, a new anthro girl approached Lyn. She was a
131.title: Lyn"

1311.content:
Raichu. She had bigger breasts then Lyn, and wore more loose clothing than Lyn.

"I see you finally found one..." Raichu smirked, "I guess you aren't useless after all"

"I'm not useless, Veronica!" Lyn responded.

"Keep telling yourself, you ugly nerd!" Veronica laughed, "Now we're taking the human home to base"

"What do you mean?" I asked. Veronica then picked me up and flicked me on the butt. It felt like a twenty-feet bee had stung me.

"Don't ask questions, little boy!" Veronica sneered, "Now we're going back to base!"

They took me to the base, where we were greeted by a
1311.title: Raichu

13111.content:
Flareon. This was also female, but she was wearing a secretary uniform.

"Oh, I see you brought another pet for the queen" the Flareon noticed.

"Yup, Queen Mirta will be most pleased!" Veronica responded.

"But...I was the one who caught him..." Lyn whimpered.

"SHUT IT!" Veronica snapped at Lyn, "Queen Mirta wouldn't believe a weak, ugly, pathetic nerd like you!"

Lyn teared up, trying her hardest not to cry. I looked at Lyn. I was bullied a lot when I was younger, so I empathized with Lyn.

"Geez, you're such a crybaby!" Veronica laughed at Lyn.

"Hey don't talk to her like that!" I cried out. Veronica looked at me and picked me up.

"Such a feisty one...I bet you taste great!" Veronica giggled as she opened her mouth and dangled me over it.

Suddenly, a large door opened, and out of the light stepped out...
13111.title: Flareon

131111.content:
Queen Mirta, a MewTwo. She looked at us and smiled.

"I see you captured a new human, Veronica" Queen Mirta noted, "You have my thanks"

"But I-"

"SHUT IT, LYN!" Veronica snapped at Lyn. Lyns tears became too much and she ran off.

"What a bully..." I thought to myself, glaring at a smiling Veronica.

"Now, give the human to me" Queen Mirta asked Veronica.

"With pleasure..." Veronica smiled as she handed me to Queen Mirta.

"Good, a new human..." Queen Mitra grinned as she carried me to a room. This room was filled with...
131111.title: Queen Mirta, a MewTwo

1311111.content:
Desserts! The room was filled with pies, cakes, cookies, ice cream, anything to stuff a man silly!

"Yum! I'm starving..." I thought as I drooled a little.

"I can tell you're hungry, little one..." Queen Mirta purred, "Dig in..."

"How can you tell?" I asked.

"I can read thoughts, and you're drooling too" Queen Mirta answered. I remembered that MewTwo was a psychic time, so that made sense.

I jumped from Queen Mirta's hand and into the room of desserts. I started at the Banana Cream Pie, which towered over me. After I finished a single slice, I noticed that Queen Mirta was licking her lips at me.

"I can sense your thoughts..." Queen Mirta stated, "After you are done here, I'm going to...
1311111.title: Desserts

13111111.content:
Eat you"

Those words shocked me. She was just fattening me up to eat me?!

"You're wondering why, as a Pokemon, why I would eat you?" Queen Mirta asked.

"I'm wondering why..." I answered.

"Did you think that humans didn't exist on our planet? Humans did exist. They enslaved us and forced us to do battle against each other, and traded us to others like slaves. Then, Queen Hera, my great-grandmother, gathered an army of Pokemon, and killed every last human. We decided that we go to every dimension to eat humans, as a way to make humans pay"

My jaw dropped in shock. I never knew that whenever you had a Pokemon battle in a game, it really was two living beings fighting each other to death. That game must have been a trap set by this world.

"Now eat up, I'm awaiting a fat supper" Queen Mirta purred as she walked out.

I sighed, bottling tears. I faced more food when I was grabbed by...
13111111.title: Eat you"

131111111.content:
Lyn.

"Lyn?" I looked at her shock.

"I'm here to rescue you!" Lyn told me as she ran out of the Dessert Room. Lyn ran through the labyrinth-like building, reaching a door to outside. She pulled the switch and we were thrown out on a small beach.

"Where are we?" I asked Lyn.

"I don't know, but all that I know is your safe" Lyn told me, holding me close. I blushed as she held my close to her chest.

Suddenly, spears were pointed at the two of us! The ones holding the spears were...
131111111.title: Lyn

1311111111.content:
Natives! Each one was a different speicies of Pokemon. One was a Purrloin, one was a Mienfoo, and the other was a Sandshrew.

"Come with us!" The Purrloin ordered. She was female, and wore a shirt made of long flowers. Lyn and I decided to listen to their orders and followed them to their Village.

At their all-female village, we stopped at the main hut. The village leader, a female Delphox, looked at us with judging eyes. Judging by her name-tag, her name was Alani.

"So why have you come here? To destroy our way of life?" Alani asked us.

"No! We just escaped from Queen Mirta's base!" I responded defensively.

"Should we help them?" A female Beautifly named Kakalina asked her leader.

"Well...
1311111111.title: Natives

13111111111.content:
Yes" Alani answered. Lyn and I jumped with joy!

"Thank you so much!" Lyn thanked Alani.

"On one condition. You must support us in defeating Queen Mirta" Alani told the two of us. I looked at Lyn. She knew that it would be suicide for us to go against Queen Mitra. But we knew she had to be stopped.

"We'll join" The two of us said in unison.

That night, I was preparing to hit the hay when Lyn walked in my room.

"May I...sleep with you?" Lyn asked me, blushing.

"Sure!" I allowed her. I looked up at her eyes, which were brown as chocolate, which sparkled like pearls.

"Lyn, do you believe in love at first sight?" I asked.
13111111111.title: Yes"

131111111111.content:
"Yes" Lyn answered as she snuggled up to me, "I do"

"Well...I do too...and I think that I'm...well..." I tried to tell Lyn that I loved her.

"You love me?" Lyn asked. I blushed redder than the ripest tomato, redder than the sweetest ketchup.

"Yes, I love you, Lyn" I confessed. Lyn blushed and put me in her hand, and then kissing me.

"I love you too...you're the nicest person I've ever met...you're so kind, and you stick up for me..." Lyn stated, "I'm so happy we met"

I thought about it for a minute. It only felt like a moment ago I was a student buying a Pokemon game, and now I'm in love with a Buizel girl. This world seemed a lot nicer, so I just curled up with Lyn and kissed her again. Her body was warm, which felt nice. I decided that I would stay in this world permanently. I'll stay with Lyn.
131111111111.title: "Yes"

1311111111111.content:
I snuggled up closer to Lyn, not realizing the Queen was observing us. She killed us. She and her army. And it was all YOUR fault. You're the one who made this all happen. You decided our fate. You didn't consider the possibilities, and now we're dead. And I thought I've found a perfect place to stay... But then a wierdo with an odd giantess fetish came and caused our death. Sicko.



THE END
1311111111111.title: The End (Heavily edit this chapter please)

14.content: "B-b-but wa h-how did I, what?" "I found you like this, are you ok?" "Uhhhh ya I guess so." Now thinking clerly you see that th pokémon is an anthro and it was female. "Whats your name little one?" "My names Joe, what's yours?"
14.title: Pikachu

15.content: This is gonna take a while, isn't it? Might as well divide it up first...
15.title: Other...

154.content: Let's divide it up in to types, ok?
154.title: Sinnoh

154332.content: Will some Normal types work?
154332.title: Normal type Pokemon?

1543321.content: What normal type do you encounter?
1543321.title: What kind?

15433211.content: Would you like the Furret to be regular or anthro?
15433211.title: Furret

info.brief_description: You find yourself shrunk and somehow teleported to a Pokemon's World.
info.description:
Rules:
• No Adult Content (Pg: 13 people)
• Try to use correct spelling and grammar.
• dnt spk n txt tlk (don't speak in text talk)
• One word Chapters (excluding choice chapters)
• Vore I guess I'll allow, but don't have the main person be swallowed.
• Don't give a dead end chapter (both choices lead to The End)
• Don't Kill the main person.


You are sent to a world, which (from your perspective) is inhabited by Giant Humans, Pokemon, and Pokemon Anthros.

Also, for the pokemon, the stage of evolution that they're in tells their age. (i.e. for the Chu line, Pichu 0-about 9, Pikachu 10-21, Raichu 22-Death)
